name: Granting Immortality
description:
Join the Bluish-Green Productions Discord Server!

  • A short interactive fiction about deciding who is worthy of receiving the gift of everlasting life.
  • Take a photo of your final screen to share who you thought deserved immortality!
  • Made for Ludum Dare 50 in 14.5 hours
  • Music by Ferrosphere (used with permission)
    • Reddit - u/ferrosphere
    • Instagram - @ferrosphere.art
Controls:
  • Move / alternate dialogue options: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick
  • Talk: Space / Gamepad-South
  • Pause: Escape / Start to adjust options;
    • Font choice: Pixelated, Sans-Serif, and Dyslexic-friendly options
    • Text-box Size: Regular / Full Width
    • Volume: Change Music / SFX Volume
Touch / Mouse Controls
  • FOR BEST MOBILE PLAY EXPERIENCE; REQUEST DESKTOP SITE
    • This will ensure that the game fits properly on-screen
    • (Tested in iOS 14; Safari and Firefox)
  • Click anywhere on-screen to bring up Touch Controls:
    • Move: Virtual Joystick (Bottom-Left Corner)
    • Talk: Contextual Button will appear when you stand near an NPC (Middle-Right side of screen)
      • Use Up / Down Arrows to switch between dialogue options
    • Pause: (Top-Left Button)
